greet.speaker: Elder Miren
greet.text: The siege tightens. Your shadow waits just beyond the lantern glow.

reminder.speaker: Elder Miren
reminder.text: Swap with Q. Let the lantern breathe so the shadow may pass.

tutorial_start.speaker: Elder Miren
tutorial_start.text: Follow and we will reach the shrine.

offer.speaker: Forgewright
offer.text: Stock rotates with the siege. Fuel, charmsâ€”take what you need.

thanks.speaker: Forgewright
thanks.text: Spend wisely. Momentum cuts both ways.

bye.speaker: Forgewright
bye.text: Come back before the next surge.

intro.speaker: Umbral Scribe
intro.text: Debt carves pathways in the dark. Appease it or be hollowed.

appease.speaker: Umbral Scribe
appease.text: Shrines drink fuel, trade it for leniency. Optional tasks ease the weight.

end.speaker: Umbral Scribe
end.text: Confidence is a sharp light. Do not let it blind you.

intro.speaker: Courier Iva
intro.text: Warehouse Row is crawling with Lightborn. Mirrors can pin them.

tips.speaker: Courier Iva
tips.text: Dash through light, swap in dark pockets. Watch the debt meter when you slow time.

intro.speaker: Shadow
intro.text: We are halves of one blade. Call me when the light wanes.

taunt.speaker: Warden
taunt.text: Lanterns answer to me. Your debt will ignite the city.
